channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Chicken parmigiana
item.description:
Chicken parmigiana



This classic chicken Parmesan recipe gets the Good Food makeover, resulting in a hearty yet healthy dish great for sharing with your mates

item.title: Pesto chickpea salad
item.description:
Pesto chickpea salad



This creamy and tangy Pesto Chickpea Salad is a quick and easy lunch. Enjoy with crackers, on a sandwich, or on top of a bed of greens.

item.title: Warm pearl couscous salad
item.description:
Warm pearl couscous salad



Pearl couscous is technically not couscous, but more of a pasta. The small round wheat-based balls are pre-toasted, which gives them their unique chewy texture and nutty flavour. This salad is delicious enjoyed warm as a meal, or cold as a summery-salad main dish or side dish.

item.title: Seekh kebab with mint chutney
item.description:
Seekh kebab with mint chutney



Served at most traditional Indian restaurants, seekh kebabs are made with ground lamb thatâ€™s been seasoned with garam masala, cumin seeds, fresh ginger and fresh cilantro, then grilled and served with raw red onion and bright mint chutney to offset the richness and heat.

item.title: Baked sweet potato with easy black bean chilli
item.description:
Baked sweet potato with easy black bean chilli



Step-by-step method for making baked sweet potato with easy black bean chilli yourself.
